mapper.insert: INSERT INTO flash_mastery.folders (id, name, description, color, deck_count, parent_id, created_at, updated_at, deleted_at) VALUES (#{id}, #{name}, #{description}, #{color}, #{deckCount}, #{parentId}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt}, #{deletedAt})
mapper.update: UPDATE flash_mastery.folders SET name = #{name}, description = #{description}, color = #{color}, deck_count = #{deckCount}, parent_id = #{parentId}, updated_at = #{updatedAt} WHERE id = #{id} AND deleted_at IS NULL
UPDATE flash_mastery.folders SET deleted_at = NOW(), updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id} AND deleted_at IS NULL
